vb12:1.1: ti → ayaṁ pāṭho mātikāyaṁ natthi, niddese pana sabbapotthakesu
vb12:12.5: muggasūpyatāya → muggasuppatāya (bj); muggasūpatāya (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | jaṅghapesanikena → jaṅghapesaniyena (bj)
vb12:25.2: majjhimayāmaṁ → majjhimaṁ yāmaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | pāde pādaṁ → pādena pādaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
vb12:60.2: thiyanā thiyitattaṁ → thīyanā thīyitattaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
